snippet.title: Aero Elite: Combat Academy PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2 v1.7.0)
snippet.description:
Aero Elite Combat Academy PS2 Gameplay
Release Date: March 11, 2003
Platforms: PlayStation 2
_____________________________________________
No Interlacing Codes: (Credits to 'asasega' from PCSX2 forums)
patch=1,EE,0040C9C8,extended,00000001
patch=1,EE,0040C9F0,extended,00000001
patch=1,EE,2040C9D0,extended,00001428
patch=1,EE,2040C9F8,extended,0000148C
_____________________________________________
PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: OpenGL (Hardware)
Interlacing (F5): Auto
Texture Filtering: Bilinear (PS2)
(✓) Accurate DATE
(✓) Conservative Buffer Allocation
Internal Resolution: 6x Native
Anisotropic Filtering: 16x
Dithering: Off
Mipmapping: Automatic (Default)
CRC Hack Level: Automatic (Default)
Blending Accuracy: High
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 16GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
_____________________________________________
  0:00 Intro
  4:14 Stage 1
  5:56 Stage 2
  9:08 Stage 3
19:27 Stage 4
_____________________________________________
Please leave a comment and rate it. :)
Enjoy !
